thread.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X’s new variant with more colour options spotted on TENAA
thread.title_full: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X’s new variant with more colour options spotted on TENAA

title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X’s new variant with more colour options spotted on TENAA
text:
Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X’s new variant with more colour options spotted on... Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X’s new variant with more colour options spotted on TENAA By - March 30, 2017 “The new Redmi Note 4X is expected to come with a deca-core MediaTek Helio X20 SoC” 
Last month, Xiaomi had launched the Redmi Note 4X in its home market of China with Qualcomm Snapdragon 625 SoC. The phone was announced in four hues – matte black, gold, cherry powder and grey. Now a new high-end variant of the Note 4X with a lot more colour options has been spotted on the Chinese certification agency TENAA . 
The new Redmi Note 4X model spotted on TENAA bears the model number MBT6A5 . The phone is listed with a 2.0GHz deca-core processor, which could possibly be an under-clocked MediaTek Helio X20 SoC, which has a clock speed of 2.1GHz. The colour options for this model on TENAA include gold, grey, silver, white, black, pink, champagne gold, matte black, dark grey and cherry blossom. 
Apart from a different SoC and more colour options, the rest of the specs of the new Redmi Note 4X on TENAA are similar to the earlier model. It is listed with an all-metal unibody design, featuring a fingerprint sensor at the rear. The device has a 5.5-inch full HD display, 4GB of RAM, 64GB of storage, 13MP/5MP cameras and a 4,000mAh battery. As of now, there’s no word when the brand is planning to launch the new Redmi Note 4X.
